resources.string: Floating window permission required to display floating content
This permission is used to display floating windows on top of other apps, such as mini windows, bubble tips, etc.
Camera permission required to use related features
This permission is used for features that require the camera, such as taking photos, scanning QR codes, etc.
Location permission required to obtain approximate geographic location
This permission is used for network-based location services, such as querying nearby content.
Precise location permission required to provide location services
This permission is used for features that require precise positioning, such as maps, navigation, etc.
Foreground location service permission required to continuously obtain location
This permission allows the app to continuously obtain your location information while running in the background, used for navigation, exercise tracking, and other features.
Read storage permission required to access files
This permission is used to read media content such as photos and files on the device.
Access audio permission required to browse media content
This permission is used to read audio files on the device.
Read storage permission required to access photos
This permission is used to read media content such as photos and files on the device.
Access video permission required to browse media content
This permission is used to read video files on the device.
Microphone permission required for recording
This permission is used for features that require the microphone, such as voice input, recording, etc.
Storage permission required to save files
This permission is used to save content such as photos and files to the device.
Activity recognition permission required for step counting
This permission is used to read device motion sensor data, count your daily steps, track exercise distance, and other health information.
Background location permission required to access location when the app is not in use

This permission allows the app to obtain your location even when running in the background or when the screen is off, used for features such as continuous activity tracking, safety monitoring, or location-based automation.
Notification permission required to display foreground service notifications
This permission allows the app to show notifications, which are required for foreground services such as background location tracking and ongoing activity updates.
Permission Request
Go to app settings to authorize
Authorize Now
Later
After authorization, you can enjoy a more complete functional experience.
